1.name: Turtle
1.text: hey there bunny, how are you?

2.name: Turtle
2.text: i hate to be down but i'm not feeling so well..

3.name: Turtle
3.text: my restaurant is always busy at night but..

8.name: Turtle
8.text: maybe you could go see frog?

9.name: Turtle
9.text: i hope he can come in, at least..?

1.name: Turtle
1.text: i'll just sit here and wait for customers..
